Naming conventions have changed.

You can go into your craft file and replace all instances of droneTwo with AoA.droneTwo and AoAero.ADVfin.

Also, the ADVfin is acting funny, with both stock aero and FAR. Troubleshooting in progress.

The new rafale cockpit is glorious! I just have one issue. Did you forget to add a hatch to the command pod? Just wondering. Also what mod do you use to get the in cockpit views while in flight while not in IVA?

Yes, please be patient, I will try to make hatches a priority.

Just pushed a commit that adds hatches to both the Hornet and Rafale.

The Rafale's collider still needs to be adjusted to expect unpredictable results with that one. The Hornet should not have any issues.

[https://github.com/martinezfg11/AoA-Technologies](https://github.com/martinezfg11/AoA-Technologies)
Silly question, but how do you install the mod?

> 
> 
> 14 hours ago, Zed86zz said:
> 
> 
> Silly question, but how do you install the mod?
> 

Hi, 

Click on this link for the latest version. [https://github.com/martinezfg11/AoA-Technologies](https://github.com/martinezfg11/AoA-Technologies)

Top right of the webpage you will see a button that says "Clone or Download". Click that and select download ZIP.

Once you download the zip, navigate into the zip file and into the GameData folder.

In the GameData folder you will see the folders, AoATech, AoATechExperimentals, and AoATechLegacy.

Just drag AoATech folder into your KerbalSpaceProgram/Gamedata directory, make sure you have ASET Props, RasterProp Monitor for the full IVA experience.

Enjoy.
Just gotta say that I'm loving this mod! Keep up the good work! ![uU3jOIC.png](http://i.imgur.com/uU3jOIC.png)![9Z1Hp1l.png](http://i.imgur.com/9Z1Hp1l.png)
